title: StarCraft 2: Reynor vs Spirit is the LONGEST Match in Years?!
excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Zerg) and Spirit (Terran). This is the longest game of high level StarCraft 2 that I've seen in a very long time.
